name: Roll The Dice (This Is Smoth)
description:
The goal is to jump in the right times and change the number of your dice to match the platforms.

KEYS:

  • W - Jump / Double Jump
  • Arrow Keys - Increase/Decrease the number of your dice
  • R - Reset Game
  • Space Bar - Start Game

This is a game where I tried to make in 48 hours and was doing pretty good until the last hour where I realized that the 3D texts in the game doesn't work on the web for some reason. So that's why I don't have any score indicaters or titles in the game :")

Game Music: Lo-fi Type Beat - Rain
